function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Health risk behaviors such as smoking and alcohol abuse","Impact":"Increased risk of malnutrition and poor health","Mitigation":"Promote healthy lifestyle choices and provide access to healthcare","Technologies":"Health education programs, telemedicine","People":"Impoverished population","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Delayed health expenditures due to poverty","Impact":"Increased risk of untreated illnesses and poor living conditions","Mitigation":"Provide financial support for healthcare, improve access to affordable healthcare services","Technologies":"Health insurance, community health clinics","People":"Impoverished population","Owner":"Government agencies, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Economic crisis impacting sustainable development goals","Impact":"Delay in achieving sustainable development goals related to poverty, hunger, health, education, and clean energy","Mitigation":"Implement policies and programs to address economic inequality and promote sustainable development","Technologies":"Financial aid programs, renewable energy technologies","People":"Global population","Owner":"International organizations, governments, non-profit organizations"}]}
